name: Root of All Weevil
description: Andrew Kohler, Justin Foster, and Sean Regan - the Three Man One Pan With A Plan Hot Dog Stand - proudly present a half finished game full of passion and vegetables. What was originally intended to be a noir detective parody/platformer hybrid ran into development complications the weekend of GGJ 23 is now uploaded here, as a fun walk around our hub world. Hope you enjoy, and happy jamming!
